### 4.2 _route_scenario æ™ºèƒ½è·¯ç”±

```python
async def _route_scenario(self, skill_id: str, message: str) -> Optional[str]:
    """åœºæ™¯è·¯ç”± - åŸºäºè§¦å‘è¯åŒ¹é…è§„åˆ™ï¼ˆä½œä¸º fallbackï¼‰"""
    skill = load_skill(skill_id)
    if not skill:
        return None

    # æ£€æŸ¥ rules ç›®å½•
    if has_rules(skill_id):
        rules_dir = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "rules"
        for rule_path in rules_dir.glob("*.md"):
            if rule_path.stem.startswith("_"):  # è·³è¿‡ _index.md
                continue
            rule = load_rule(skill_id, rule_path.stem)
            if rule and rule.tags:
                message_lower = message.lower()
                for tag in rule.tags:
                    if tag.lower() in message_lower:
                        return rule_path.stem  # è¿”å›è§„åˆ™ ID

    return skill.default_scenario
```

   304â†’    def _fuse_scores(
   305â†’        self,
   306â†’        bazi_scores: Dict[str, float],
   307â†’        zodiac_scores: Dict[str, float],
   308â†’        bazi_primary: Optional[str],
   309â†’        zodiac_primary: Optional[str]
   310â†’    ) -> Dict[str, float]:
   311â†’        """èåˆ12åŸå‹å¾—åˆ†"""
   312â†’        fused = {}
   313â†’        weights = self.fusion_config.weights
   314â†’        consistency = self.fusion_config.consistency
   315â†’
   316â†’        for archetype in Archetype:
   317â†’            arch_name = archetype.value
   318â†’            bazi_score = bazi_scores.get(arch_name, 0.0)
   319â†’            zodiac_score = zodiac_scores.get(arch_name, 0.0)
   320â†’
   321â†’            # åŸºç¡€èåˆ
   322â†’            base_score = (
   323â†’                bazi_score * weights.bazi +
   324â†’                zodiac_score * weights.zodiac
   325â†’            )
   326â†’
   327â†’            # ä¸€è‡´æ€§å¥–åŠ±
   328â†’            if bazi_primary and zodiac_primary:
   329â†’                if arch_name == bazi_primary and arch_name == zodiac_primary:
   330â†’                    base_score += consistency.bonus
   331â†’
   332â†’            fused[arch_name] = base_score
   333â†’
   334â†’        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° 0-100
   335â†’        max_score = max(fused.values()) if fused else 1.0
   336â†’        if max_score > 0:
   337â†’            for arch in fused:
   338â†’                fused[arch] = round((fused[arch] / max_score) * 100, 1)
   339â†’
   340â†’        return fused
   341â†’

   361â†’    def calculate_bazi_scores(self, bazi_analysis: BaziAnalysis) -> Dict[str, float]:
   362â†’        """è®¡ç®—å…«å­—åŸå‹å¾—åˆ†"""
   363â†’        scores = {arch.value: 0.0 for arch in Archetype}
   364â†’
   365â†’        if bazi_analysis.primary_archetype:
   366â†’            scores[bazi_analysis.primary_archetype] = 1.0
   367â†’
   368â†’        if bazi_analysis.secondary_archetype:
   369â†’            scores[bazi_analysis.secondary_archetype] = 0.5
   370â†’
   371â†’        scores = self._apply_strength_modifier(
   372â†’            scores,
   373â†’            bazi_analysis.day_master_strength_score
   374â†’        )
   375â†’
   376â†’        return scores
   377â†’
   378â†’    def _apply_strength_modifier(
   379â†’        self,
   380â†’        scores: Dict[str, float],
   381â†’        strength_score: float
   382â†’    ) -> Dict[str, float]:
   383â†’        """æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ä¿®æ­£"""
   384â†’        categories = self.archetypes_config.categories
   385â†’        extrovert_archetypes = set(categories.extrovert)
   386â†’        introvert_archetypes = set(categories.introvert)
   387â†’        coefficient = self.fusion_config.strength_modifier.coefficient
   388â†’
   389â†’        if strength_score > 0:  # èº«æ—º
   390â†’            modifier = 1 + strength_score * coefficient
   391â†’            for archetype in extrovert_archetypes:
   392â†’                if archetype in scores:
   393â†’                    scores[archetype] *= modifier
   394â†’        else:  # èº«å¼±
   395â†’            modifier = 1 + abs(strength_score) * coefficient
   396â†’            for archetype in introvert_archetypes:
   397â†’                if archetype in scores:
   398â†’                    scores[archetype] *= modifier
   399â†’
   400â†’        return scores
   401â†’

    82â†’class BaziAnalyzer:
    83â†’    """
    84â†’    å…«å­—ä¸­ç­‰æ·±åº¦åˆ†æå™¨ï¼ˆé…ç½®é©±åŠ¨ï¼‰
    85â†’
    86â†’    å®ç°:
    87â†’    1. æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆå¾—ä»¤/å¾—åœ°/å¾—åŠ¿/åˆå†²ï¼‰
    88â†’    2. ç”¨ç¥å–œå¿Œåˆ¤æ–­

    90â†’    4. æ ¼å±€+ç”¨ç¥â†’åŸå‹æ˜ å°„

    93â†’    def __init__(self):

   103â†’    def analyze(self, bazi_chart: Dict[str, Any]) -> BaziAnalysis:
   104â†’        """
   105â†’        åˆ†æå…«å­—å‘½ç›˜

   107â†’        Args:
   108â†’            bazi_chart: å…«å­—å‘½ç›˜æ•°æ®ï¼ŒåŒ…å« four_pillars, day_master ç­‰
   109â†’
   110â†’        Returns:
   111â†’            BaziAnalysis åˆ†æç»“æœ
   112â†’        """
   113â†’        # æå–åŸºç¡€æ•°æ®
   114â†’        day_master = self._get_day_master(bazi_chart)
   115â†’        day_master_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   116â†’            day_master,

   125â†’
   126â†’        # 2. åˆ¤æ–­æ ¼å±€
   127â†’        pattern = self._determine_pattern(day_master, four_pillars)
   128â†’
   129â†’        # 3. ç¡®å®šç”¨ç¥
   130â†’        useful_god = self._determine_useful_god(

   132â†’        )
   133â†’
   134â†’        # 4. æ˜ å°„åŸå‹
   135â†’        archetype_mapping = self._mappings.get_pattern_mapping(pattern, useful_god)
   136â†’
   137â†’        return BaziAnalysis(
   138â†’            day_master=day_master,

   140â†’            day_master_strength=strength,

   149â†’    def _get_day_master(self, bazi_chart: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
   150â†’        """è·å–æ—¥ä¸»å¤©å¹²"""
   151â†’        default = self.bazi_config.defaults.day_master
   152â†’
   153â†’        # å°è¯•å¤šç§æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼
   154â†’        if "day_master" in bazi_chart:
   155â†’            dm = bazi_chart["day_master"]
   156â†’            if isinstance(dm, dict):
   157â†’                return dm.get("stem", default)
   158â†’            return dm
   159â†’
   160â†’        if "four_pillars" in bazi_chart:
   161â†’            day_pillar = bazi_chart["four_pillars"].get("day", {})
   162â†’            if isinstance(day_pillar, dict):
   163â†’                return day_pillar.get("stem", default)
   164â†’
   165â†’        return default

   167â†’    def _calculate_day_master_strength(
   168â†’        self,
   169â†’        day_master: str,
   170â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   171â†’    ) -> Tuple[str, float]:
   172â†’        """
   173â†’        è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±
   174â†’
   175â†’        åŸºäº:
   176â†’        1. å¾—ä»¤ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„å½±å“ï¼‰
   177â†’        2. å¾—åœ°ï¼ˆå››æ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼‰
   178â†’        3. å¾—åŠ¿ï¼ˆå¤©å¹²é€å‡ºçš„å¸®æ‰¶ï¼‰
   179â†’        4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£
   180â†’
   181â†’        Returns:
   182â†’            (å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§, å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•° -1.0 åˆ° 1.0)
   183â†’        """
   184â†’        score = 0.0
   185â†’        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   186â†’            day_master,
   187â†’            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
   188â†’        )
   189â†’        weights = self.bazi_config.strength_weights
   190â†’
   191â†’        # 1. å¾—ä»¤åˆ¤æ–­
   192â†’        month_branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, "month")
   193â†’        seasonal_factor = self._calculate_seasonal_strength(dm_element, month_branch)
   194â†’        score += seasonal_factor * weights.seasonal
   195â†’
   196â†’        # 2. å¾—åœ°åˆ¤æ–­
   197â†’        root_factor = self._calculate_root_strength(day_master, four_pillars)
   198â†’        score += root_factor * weights.root
   199â†’
   200â†’        # 3. å¾—åŠ¿åˆ¤æ–­
   201â†’        support_factor = self._calculate_stem_support(day_master, four_pillars)
   202â†’        score += support_factor * weights.support
   203â†’
   204â†’        # 4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£
   205â†’        combination_factor = self._calculate_combination_effect(day_master, four_pillars)
   206â†’        score += combination_factor * weights.combination
   207â†’
   208â†’        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç­‰çº§ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®é˜ˆå€¼ï¼‰
   209â†’        thresholds = self.bazi_config.strength_thresholds
   210â†’        if score >= thresholds.extremely_strong:
   211â†’            return ("ææ—º", score)
   212â†’        elif score >= thresholds.strong:
   213â†’            return ("åæ—º", score)
   214â†’        elif score >= thresholds.balanced_lower:
   215â†’            return ("ä¸­å’Œ", score)
   216â†’        elif score >= thresholds.weak:
   217â†’            return ("åå¼±", score)
   218â†’        else:
   219â†’            return ("æå¼±", score)

   221â†’    def _calculate_seasonal_strength(self, dm_element: str, month_branch: str) -> float:
   222â†’        """
   223â†’        è®¡ç®—å¾—ä»¤å¼ºåº¦
   224â†’
   225â†’        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„å­£èŠ‚å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•°
   226â†’        """
   227â†’        if not month_branch:
   228â†’            return 0.0
   229â†’
   230â†’        season_element = self._mappings.month_branch_season.get(month_branch, "earth")
   231â†’        scores = self.bazi_config.seasonal_scores
   232â†’        element_generates = self._mappings.element_generates
   233â†’        element_controls = self._mappings.element_controls
   234â†’
   235â†’        # å½“ä»¤ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œä¸æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œç›¸åŒï¼‰
   236â†’        if season_element == dm_element:
   237â†’            return scores.in_season
   238â†’
   239â†’        # ç›¸ç”Ÿï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œç”Ÿæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œï¼‰
   240â†’        if element_generates.get(season_element) == dm_element:
   241â†’            return scores.generated
   242â†’
   243â†’        # è¢«ç”Ÿï¼ˆæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œç”Ÿæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œï¼‰- æ³„æ°”
   244â†’        if element_generates.get(dm_element) == season_element:
   245â†’            return scores.drained
   246â†’
   247â†’        # è¢«å…‹ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œå…‹æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œï¼‰
   248â†’        if element_controls.get(season_element) == dm_element:
   249â†’            return scores.controlled
   250â†’
   251â†’        # å…‹åˆ¶ï¼ˆæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œå…‹æœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œï¼‰- è€—æ°”
   252â†’        if element_controls.get(dm_element) == season_element:
   253â†’            return scores.controlling
   254â†’
   255â†’        return 0.0
   256â†’
   257â†’    def _calculate_root_strength(
   258â†’        self,
   259â†’        day_master: str,
   260â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   261â†’    ) -> float:
   262â†’        """
   263â†’        è®¡ç®—å¾—åœ°å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆå››æ”¯è—å¹²ä¸­çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼‰
   264â†’
   265â†’        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„æ ¹æ°”å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•°
   266â†’        """
   267â†’        score = 0.0
   268â†’        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   269â†’            day_master,
   270â†’            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
   271â†’        )
   272â†’        root_scores = self.bazi_config.root_scores
   273â†’        element_generates = self._mappings.element_generates
   274â†’
   275â†’        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "day", "hour"]:
   276â†’            branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   277â†’            if not branch:
   278â†’                continue
   279â†’
   280â†’            hidden_stems = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch, [])
   281â†’            for i, hidden in enumerate(hidden_stems):
   282â†’                hidden_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(hidden, "")
   283â†’
   284â†’                # åŒäº”è¡Œä¸ºæ ¹
   285â†’                if hidden_element == dm_element:
   286â†’                    if i == 0:  # æœ¬æ°”
   287â†’                        score += root_scores.main_qi
   288â†’                    elif i == 1:  # ä¸­æ°”
   289â†’                        score += root_scores.middle_qi
   290â†’                    else:  # ä½™æ°”
   291â†’                        score += root_scores.residual_qi
   292â†’
   293â†’                # ç”Ÿæˆ‘è€…ä¹Ÿç®—å¼±æ ¹
   294â†’                elif element_generates.get(hidden_element) == dm_element:
   295â†’                    score += root_scores.indirect_support
   296â†’
   297â†’        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° -1 åˆ° 1
   298â†’        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, (score - 1.0) / 2.0))
   299â†’
   300â†’    def _calculate_stem_support(
   301â†’        self,
   302â†’        day_master: str,
   303â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   304â†’    ) -> float:
   305â†’        """
   306â†’        è®¡ç®—å¾—åŠ¿å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆå¤©å¹²å¸®æ‰¶ï¼‰
   307â†’
   308â†’        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„å¤©å¹²å¸®æ‰¶åˆ†æ•°

   310â†’        score = 0.0
   311â†’        support_scores = self.bazi_config.stem_support_scores
   312â†’
   313â†’        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "hour"]:  # ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬æ—¥å¹²æœ¬èº«
   314â†’            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   315â†’            if not stem:
   316â†’                continue
   317â†’
   318â†’            ten_god = get_ten_god(day_master, stem, self._mappings)
   319â†’
   320â†’            if ten_god in ["æ¯”è‚©", "åŠ«è´¢"]:
   321â†’                score += support_scores.peer
   322â†’            elif ten_god in ["æ­£å°", "åå°"]:
   323â†’                score += support_scores.resource
   324â†’            elif ten_god in ["é£Ÿç¥", "ä¼¤å®˜"]:
   325â†’                score += support_scores.output
   326â†’            elif ten_god in ["æ­£è´¢", "åè´¢"]:
   327â†’                score += support_scores.wealth
   328â†’            elif ten_god in ["æ­£å®˜", "ä¸ƒæ€"]:
   329â†’                score += support_scores.power
   330â†’
   331â†’        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–
   332â†’        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, score / 1.5))

   334â†’    def _calculate_combination_effect(
   335â†’        self,
   336â†’        day_master: str,
   337â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   338â†’    ) -> float:
   339â†’        """
   340â†’        è®¡ç®—åˆå†²æ•ˆåº”
   341â†’
   342â†’        åŸºäºé…ç½®çš„åˆå†²è§„åˆ™è®¡ç®—
   343â†’        """
   344â†’        score = 0.0
   345â†’        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
   346â†’            day_master,
   347â†’            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
   348â†’        )
   349â†’        effect_scores = self._combination_rules.effect_scores
   350â†’
   351â†’        # æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å¤©å¹²å’Œåœ°æ”¯
   352â†’        stems = []
   353â†’        branches = []
   354â†’        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "day", "hour"]:
   355â†’            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   356â†’            branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, pillar_name)
   357â†’            if stem:
   358â†’                stems.append(stem)
   359â†’            if branch:
   360â†’                branches.append(branch)
   361â†’
   362â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥å¤©å¹²åˆ
   363â†’        for i, stem1 in enumerate(stems):
   364â†’            for stem2 in stems[i+1:]:
   365â†’                combo = self._combination_rules.check_stem_combination(stem1, stem2)
   366â†’                if combo:
   367â†’                    result_element = combo.get("result", "")
   368â†’                    # å¦‚æœåˆåŒ–åçš„äº”è¡Œä¸æ—¥ä¸»ç›¸åŒæˆ–ç”Ÿï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ä¸»ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰åˆ©
   369â†’                    if result_element == dm_element:
   370â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   371â†’                            "stem_combination_success", 0.3
   372â†’                        )
   373â†’                    elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
   374â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   375â†’                            "stem_combination_partial", 0.15
   376â†’                        )
   377â†’
   378â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯å…­å†²
   379â†’        for i, branch1 in enumerate(branches):
   380â†’            for branch2 in branches[i+1:]:
   381â†’                clash = self._combination_rules.check_branch_clash(branch1, branch2)
   382â†’                if clash:
   383â†’                    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å†²åˆ°æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹
   384â†’                    branch1_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch1, [])
   385â†’                    branch2_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch2, [])
   386â†’
   387â†’                    # å¦‚æœå†²åˆ°æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼Œå‡åˆ†æ›´å¤š
   388â†’                    has_root = False
   389â†’                    for hidden in branch1_hidden + branch2_hidden:
   390â†’                        if self._mappings.stem_elements.get(hidden) == dm_element:
   391â†’                            has_root = True
   392â†’                            break
   393â†’
   394â†’                    if has_root:
   395â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("clash", {}).get(
   396â†’                            "branch_clash_with_root", -0.3
   397â†’                        )
   398â†’                    else:
   399â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("clash", {}).get(
   400â†’                            "branch_clash", -0.2
   401â†’                        )
   402â†’
   403â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯å…­åˆ
   404â†’        for i, branch1 in enumerate(branches):
   405â†’            for branch2 in branches[i+1:]:
   406â†’                combo = self._combination_rules.check_branch_six_combination(branch1, branch2)
   407â†’                if combo:
   408â†’                    result_element = combo.get("result", "")
   409â†’                    if result_element == dm_element:
   410â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   411â†’                            "branch_six_combination_success", 0.25
   412â†’                        )
   413â†’                    elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
   414â†’                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   415â†’                            "branch_six_combination_partial", 0.12
   416â†’                        )
   417â†’
   418â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯ä¸‰åˆ
   419â†’        if len(branches) >= 3:
   420â†’            combo = self._combination_rules.check_branch_three_combination(branches)
   421â†’            if combo:
   422â†’                result_element = combo.get("result", "")
   423â†’                if result_element == dm_element:
   424â†’                    score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   425â†’                        "branch_three_combination_success", 0.35
   426â†’                    )
   427â†’                elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
   428â†’                    score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
   429â†’                        "branch_three_combination_partial", 0.18
   430â†’                    )
   431â†’
   432â†’        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° -1 åˆ° 1
   433â†’        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, score))

   435â†’    def _determine_pattern(
   436â†’        self,
   437â†’        day_master: str,
   438â†’        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
   439â†’    ) -> str:
   440â†’        """
   441â†’        åˆ¤æ–­å…«å­—æ ¼å±€
   442â†’
   443â†’        åŸºäºæœˆä»¤é€å¹²å–æ ¼çš„åŸåˆ™ï¼š
   444â†’        1. æ£€æŸ¥æœˆä»¤è—å¹²æ˜¯å¦é€å‡ºåˆ°å¤©å¹²
   445â†’        2. é€å‡ºè€…ä¸ºæ ¼å±€
   446â†’        3. æœªé€å‡ºåˆ™å–æœˆä»¤æœ¬æ°”
   447â†’        """
   448â†’        default_pattern = self.bazi_config.defaults.pattern
   449â†’        month_branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, "month")
   450â†’        if not month_branch:
   451â†’            return default_pattern
   452â†’
   453â†’        month_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(month_branch, [])
   454â†’        if not month_hidden:
   455â†’            return default_pattern
   456â†’
   457â†’        # æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å¤©å¹²ï¼ˆé™¤æ—¥ä¸»å¤–ï¼‰

"""
å…«å­—ä¸­ç­‰æ·±åº¦åˆ†æå™¨ - VibeID v5.0 (é…ç½®é©±åŠ¨ç‰ˆ)

å®ç°æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±ã€ç”¨ç¥å–œå¿Œã€æ ¼å±€åˆ¤æ–­å’ŒåŸå‹æ˜ å°„ã€‚

åŸºäºã€Šæ»´å¤©é«“ã€‹ã€Šç©·é€šå®é‰´ã€‹ã€Šå­å¹³çœŸè¯ ã€‹çš„æ ¸å¿ƒç†è®ºï¼Œ
é‡‡ç”¨ä¸­ç­‰æ·±åº¦ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå¹³è¡¡å‡†ç¡®æ€§å’Œå®ç°å¤æ‚åº¦ã€‚

æ‰€æœ‰ç®—æ³•å‚æ•°ä»é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½ï¼Œæ”¯æŒçµæ´»è°ƒæ•´ã€‚
"""

import logging
from typing import Dict, Any, Tuple, Optional, List

from ...models import BaziAnalysis
from ..config_loader import (
    get_config,
    get_bazi_mappings,
    get_combination_rules,
    BaziMappings,
    CombinationRules,
)

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# åç¥è®¡ç®—
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

def get_ten_god(day_master: str, other_stem: str, mappings: BaziMappings) -> str:
    """
    è®¡ç®—åç¥å…³ç³»

    Args:
        day_master: æ—¥ä¸»å¤©å¹²
        other_stem: å…¶ä»–å¤©å¹²
        mappings: å…«å­—æ˜ å°„é…ç½®

    Returns:
        åç¥åç§°
    """
    stem_elements = mappings.stem_elements
    stem_polarity = mappings.stem_polarity
    element_generates = mappings.element_generates
    element_controls = mappings.element_controls

    dm_element = stem_elements.get(day_master, "wood")
    dm_polarity = stem_polarity.get(day_master, "yang")
    other_element = stem_elements.get(other_stem, "wood")
    other_polarity = stem_polarity.get(other_stem, "yang")

    same_polarity = dm_polarity == other_polarity

    # åŒæˆ‘è€… - æ¯”åŠ«
    if other_element == dm_element:
        return "æ¯”è‚©" if same_polarity else "åŠ«è´¢"

    # æˆ‘ç”Ÿè€… - é£Ÿä¼¤
    if element_generates.get(dm_element) == other_element:
        return "é£Ÿç¥" if same_polarity else "ä¼¤å®˜"

    # æˆ‘å…‹è€… - è´¢æ˜Ÿ
    if element_controls.get(dm_element) == other_element:
        return "åè´¢" if same_polarity else "æ­£è´¢"

    # å…‹æˆ‘è€… - å®˜æ€
    if element_controls.get(other_element) == dm_element:
        return "ä¸ƒæ€" if same_polarity else "æ­£å®˜"

    # ç”Ÿæˆ‘è€… - å°æ˜Ÿ
    if element_generates.get(other_element) == dm_element:
        return "åå°" if same_polarity else "æ­£å°"

    return "æ¯”è‚©"  # é»˜è®¤


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# å…«å­—åˆ†æå™¨
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•ï¿½ï¿½â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

class BaziAnalyzer:
    """
    å…«å­—ä¸­ç­‰æ·±åº¦åˆ†æå™¨ï¼ˆé…ç½®é©±åŠ¨ï¼‰

    å®ç°:
    1. æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆå¾—ä»¤/å¾—åœ°/å¾—åŠ¿/åˆå†²ï¼‰
    2. ç”¨ç¥å–œå¿Œåˆ¤æ–­
    3. æ ¼å±€åˆ¤æ–­
    4. æ ¼å±€+ç”¨ç¥â†’åŸå‹æ˜ å°„
    """

    def __init__(self):
        self._config = get_config()
        self._mappings = get_bazi_mappings()
        self._combination_rules = get_combination_rules()

    @property
    def bazi_config(self):
        """è·å–å…«å­—é…ç½®"""
        return self._config.bazi

    def analyze(self, bazi_chart: Dict[str, Any]) -> BaziAnalysis:
        """
        åˆ†æå…«å­—å‘½ç›˜

        Args:
            bazi_chart: å…«å­—å‘½ç›˜æ•°æ®ï¼ŒåŒ…å« four_pillars, day_master ç­‰

        Returns:
            BaziAnalysis åˆ†æç»“æœ
        """
        # æå–åŸºç¡€æ•°æ®
        day_master = self._get_day_master(bazi_chart)
        day_master_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
            day_master,
            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
        )
        four_pillars = bazi_chart.get("four_pillars", {})

        # 1. è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±
        strength, strength_score = self._calculate_day_master_strength(
            day_master, four_pillars
        )

        # 2. åˆ¤æ–­æ ¼å±€
        pattern = self._determine_pattern(day_master, four_pillars)

        # 3. ç¡®å®šç”¨ç¥
        useful_god = self._determine_useful_god(
            day_master, four_pillars, strength, strength_score
        )

        # 4. æ˜ å°„åŸå‹
        archetype_mapping = self._mappings.get_pattern_mapping(pattern, useful_god)

        return BaziAnalysis(
            day_master=day_master,
            day_master_element=day_master_element,
            day_master_strength=strength,
            day_master_strength_score=strength_score,
            pattern=pattern,
            useful_god=useful_god,
            archetype_driver=archetype_mapping.driver or "",
            primary_archetype=archetype_mapping.primary,
            secondary_archetype=archetype_mapping.secondary,
        )

    def _get_day_master(self, bazi_chart: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
        """è·å–æ—¥ä¸»å¤©å¹²"""
        default = self.bazi_config.defaults.day_master

        # å°è¯•å¤šç§æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼
        if "day_master" in bazi_chart:
            dm = bazi_chart["day_master"]
            if isinstance(dm, dict):
                return dm.get("stem", default)
            return dm

        if "four_pillars" in bazi_chart:
            day_pillar = bazi_chart["four_pillars"].get("day", {})
            if isinstance(day_pillar, dict):
                return day_pillar.get("stem", default)

        return default

    def _calculate_day_master_strength(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
    ) -> Tuple[str, float]:
        """
        è®¡ç®—æ—¥ä¸»å¼ºå¼±

        åŸºäº:
        1. å¾—ä»¤ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„å½±å“ï¼‰
        2. å¾—åœ°ï¼ˆå››æ”¯å¯¹æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼‰
        3. å¾—åŠ¿ï¼ˆå¤©å¹²é€å‡ºçš„å¸®æ‰¶ï¼‰
        4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£

        Returns:
            (å¼ºå¼±ç­‰çº§, å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•° -1.0 åˆ° 1.0)
        """
        score = 0.0
        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
            day_master,
            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
        )
        weights = self.bazi_config.strength_weights

        # 1. å¾—ä»¤åˆ¤æ–­
        month_branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, "month")
        seasonal_factor = self._calculate_seasonal_strength(dm_element, month_branch)
        score += seasonal_factor * weights.seasonal

        # 2. å¾—åœ°åˆ¤æ–­
        root_factor = self._calculate_root_strength(day_master, four_pillars)
        score += root_factor * weights.root

        # 3. å¾—åŠ¿åˆ¤æ–­
        support_factor = self._calculate_stem_support(day_master, four_pillars)
        score += support_factor * weights.support

        # 4. åˆå†²ä¿®æ­£
        combination_factor = self._calculate_combination_effect(day_master, four_pillars)
        score += combination_factor * weights.combination

        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç­‰çº§ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®é˜ˆå€¼ï¼‰
        thresholds = self.bazi_config.strength_thresholds
        if score >= thresholds.extremely_strong:
            return ("ææ—º", score)
        elif score >= thresholds.strong:
            return ("åæ—º", score)
        elif score >= thresholds.balanced_lower:
            return ("ä¸­å’Œ", score)
        elif score >= thresholds.weak:
            return ("åå¼±", score)
        else:
            return ("æå¼±", score)

    def _calculate_seasonal_strength(self, dm_element: str, month_branch: str) -> float:
        """
        è®¡ç®—å¾—ä»¤å¼ºåº¦

        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„å­£èŠ‚å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•°
        """
        if not month_branch:
            return 0.0

        season_element = self._mappings.month_branch_season.get(month_branch, "earth")
        scores = self.bazi_config.seasonal_scores
        element_generates = self._mappings.element_generates
        element_controls = self._mappings.element_controls

        # å½“ä»¤ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œä¸æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œç›¸åŒï¼‰
        if season_element == dm_element:
            return scores.in_season

        # ç›¸ç”Ÿï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œç”Ÿæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œï¼‰
        if element_generates.get(season_element) == dm_element:
            return scores.generated

        # è¢«ç”Ÿï¼ˆæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œç”Ÿæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œï¼‰- æ³„æ°”
        if element_generates.get(dm_element) == season_element:
            return scores.drained

        # è¢«å…‹ï¼ˆæœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œå…‹æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œï¼‰
        if element_controls.get(season_element) == dm_element:
            return scores.controlled

        # å…‹åˆ¶ï¼ˆæ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œå…‹æœˆæ”¯äº”è¡Œï¼‰- è€—æ°”
        if element_controls.get(dm_element) == season_element:
            return scores.controlling

        return 0.0

    def _calculate_root_strength(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
    ) -> float:
        """
        è®¡ç®—å¾—åœ°å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆå››æ”¯è—å¹²ä¸­çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼‰

        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„æ ¹æ°”å¼ºåº¦åˆ†æ•°
        """
        score = 0.0
        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
            day_master,
            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
        )
        root_scores = self.bazi_config.root_scores
        element_generates = self._mappings.element_generates

        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "day", "hour"]:
            branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, pillar_name)
            if not branch:
                continue

            hidden_stems = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch, [])
            for i, hidden in enumerate(hidden_stems):
                hidden_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(hidden, "")

                # åŒäº”è¡Œä¸ºæ ¹
                if hidden_element == dm_element:
                    if i == 0:  # æœ¬æ°”
                        score += root_scores.main_qi
                    elif i == 1:  # ä¸­æ°”
                        score += root_scores.middle_qi
                    else:  # ä½™æ°”
                        score += root_scores.residual_qi

                # ç”Ÿæˆ‘è€…ä¹Ÿç®—å¼±æ ¹
                elif element_generates.get(hidden_element) == dm_element:
                    score += root_scores.indirect_support

        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° -1 åˆ° 1
        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, (score - 1.0) / 2.0))

    def _calculate_stem_support(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
    ) -> float:
        """
        è®¡ç®—å¾—åŠ¿å¼ºåº¦ï¼ˆå¤©å¹²å¸®æ‰¶ï¼‰

        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„å¤©å¹²å¸®æ‰¶åˆ†æ•°
        """
        score = 0.0
        support_scores = self.bazi_config.stem_support_scores

        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "hour"]:  # ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬æ—¥å¹²æœ¬èº«
            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
            if not stem:
                continue

            ten_god = get_ten_god(day_master, stem, self._mappings)

            if ten_god in ["æ¯”è‚©", "åŠ«è´¢"]:
                score += support_scores.peer
            elif ten_god in ["æ­£å°", "åå°"]:
                score += support_scores.resource
            elif ten_god in ["é£Ÿç¥", "ä¼¤å®˜"]:
                score += support_scores.output
            elif ten_god in ["æ­£è´¢", "åè´¢"]:
                score += support_scores.wealth
            elif ten_god in ["æ­£å®˜", "ä¸ƒæ€"]:
                score += support_scores.power

        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–
        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, score / 1.5))

    def _calculate_combination_effect(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
    ) -> float:
        """
        è®¡ç®—åˆå†²æ•ˆåº”

        åŸºäºé…ç½®çš„åˆå†²è§„åˆ™è®¡ç®—
        """
        score = 0.0
        dm_element = self._mappings.stem_elements.get(
            day_master,
            self.bazi_config.defaults.element
        )
        effect_scores = self._combination_rules.effect_scores

        # æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å¤©å¹²å’Œåœ°æ”¯
        stems = []
        branches = []
        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "day", "hour"]:
            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
            branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, pillar_name)
            if stem:
                stems.append(stem)
            if branch:
                branches.append(branch)

        # æ£€æŸ¥å¤©å¹²åˆ
        for i, stem1 in enumerate(stems):
            for stem2 in stems[i+1:]:
                combo = self._combination_rules.check_stem_combination(stem1, stem2)
                if combo:
                    result_element = combo.get("result", "")
                    # å¦‚æœåˆåŒ–åçš„äº”è¡Œä¸æ—¥ä¸»ç›¸åŒæˆ–ç”Ÿï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ä¸»ï¼Œåˆ™æœ‰åˆ©
                    if result_element == dm_element:
                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
                            "stem_combination_success", 0.3
                        )
                    elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
                            "stem_combination_partial", 0.15
                        )

        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯å…­å†²
        for i, branch1 in enumerate(branches):
            for branch2 in branches[i+1:]:
                clash = self._combination_rules.check_branch_clash(branch1, branch2)
                if clash:
                    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å†²åˆ°æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹
                    branch1_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch1, [])
                    branch2_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(branch2, [])

                    # å¦‚æœå†²åˆ°æ—¥ä¸»çš„æ ¹æ°”ï¼Œå‡åˆ†æ›´å¤š
                    has_root = False
                    for hidden in branch1_hidden + branch2_hidden:
                        if self._mappings.stem_elements.get(hidden) == dm_element:
                            has_root = True
                            break

                    if has_root:
                        score += effect_scores.get("clash", {}).get(
                            "branch_clash_with_root", -0.3
                        )
                    else:
                        score += effect_scores.get("clash", {}).get(
                            "branch_clash", -0.2
                        )

        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯å…­åˆ
        for i, branch1 in enumerate(branches):
            for branch2 in branches[i+1:]:
                combo = self._combination_rules.check_branch_six_combination(branch1, branch2)
                if combo:
                    result_element = combo.get("result", "")
                    if result_element == dm_element:
                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
                            "branch_six_combination_success", 0.25
                        )
                    elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
                        score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
                            "branch_six_combination_partial", 0.12
                        )

        # æ£€æŸ¥åœ°æ”¯ä¸‰åˆ
        if len(branches) >= 3:
            combo = self._combination_rules.check_branch_three_combination(branches)
            if combo:
                result_element = combo.get("result", "")
                if result_element == dm_element:
                    score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
                        "branch_three_combination_success", 0.35
                    )
                elif self._mappings.element_generates.get(result_element) == dm_element:
                    score += effect_scores.get("combination", {}).get(
                        "branch_three_combination_partial", 0.18
                    )

        # å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° -1 åˆ° 1
        return min(1.0, max(-1.0, score))

    def _determine_pattern(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
    ) -> str:
        """
        åˆ¤æ–­å…«å­—æ ¼å±€

        åŸºäºæœˆä»¤é€å¹²å–æ ¼çš„åŸåˆ™ï¼š
        1. æ£€æŸ¥æœˆä»¤è—å¹²æ˜¯å¦é€å‡ºåˆ°å¤©å¹²
        2. é€å‡ºè€…ä¸ºæ ¼å±€
        3. æœªé€å‡ºåˆ™å–æœˆä»¤æœ¬æ°”
        """
        default_pattern = self.bazi_config.defaults.pattern
        month_branch = self._get_branch(four_pillars, "month")
        if not month_branch:
            return default_pattern

        month_hidden = self._mappings.branch_hidden_stems.get(month_branch, [])
        if not month_hidden:
            return default_pattern

        # æ”¶é›†æ‰€æœ‰å¤©å¹²ï¼ˆé™¤æ—¥ä¸»å¤–ï¼‰
        stems = []
        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "hour"]:
            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
            if stem and stem != day_master:
                stems.append(stem)

        # æ£€æŸ¥æœˆä»¤è—å¹²æ˜¯å¦é€å‡º
        for hidden in month_hidden:
            if hidden in stems and hidden != day_master:
                ten_god = get_ten_god(day_master, hidden, self._mappings)
                return f"{ten_god}æ ¼"

        # æœªé€å‡ºï¼Œå–æœˆä»¤æœ¬æ°”
        if month_hidden:
            main_hidden = month_hidden[0]
            if main_hidden != day_master:
                ten_god = get_ten_god(day_master, main_hidden, self._mappings)
                return f"{ten_god}æ ¼"

        return default_pattern

    def _determine_useful_god(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any],
        strength: str,
        strength_score: float
    ) -> str:
        """
        ç¡®å®šç”¨ç¥

        åŸºæœ¬åŸåˆ™ï¼š
        - èº«æ—ºï¼šå–œè´¢å®˜é£Ÿä¼¤ï¼ˆæ³„è€—ä¹‹ç¥ï¼‰
        - èº«å¼±ï¼šå–œå°æ¯”ï¼ˆç”Ÿæ‰¶ä¹‹ç¥ï¼‰
        - ä¸­å’Œï¼šé¡ºåŠ¿å–ç”¨
        """
        # ç»Ÿè®¡å„ç±»åç¥æ•°é‡
        ten_god_counts = self._count_ten_gods(day_master, four_pillars)

        if strength in ["åæ—º", "ææ—º"]:
            # èº«æ—ºå–œæ³„è€—
            if ten_god_counts.get("é£Ÿä¼¤", 0) >= 1:
                return "é£Ÿä¼¤"
            elif ten_god_counts.get("è´¢", 0) >= 1:
                return "è´¢"
            else:
                return "å®˜æ€"

        elif strength in ["åå¼±", "æå¼±"]:
            # èº«å¼±å–œç”Ÿæ‰¶
            if ten_god_counts.get("å°", 0) >= 1:
                return "å°"
            else:
                return "æ¯”åŠ«"

        else:
            # ä¸­å’Œå–å¹³è¡¡ - çœ‹å“ªç±»åç¥æœ€å¼º
            max_category = max(ten_god_counts, key=ten_god_counts.get, default="è´¢")
            return max_category

    def _count_ten_gods(
        self,
        day_master: str,
        four_pillars: Dict[str, Any]
    ) -> Dict[str, int]:
        """ç»Ÿè®¡å„ç±»åç¥æ•°é‡"""
        counts = {"è´¢": 0, "å®˜æ€": 0, "å°": 0, "é£Ÿä¼¤": 0, "æ¯”åŠ«": 0}

        for pillar_name in ["year", "month", "hour"]:
            stem = self._get_stem(four_pillars, pillar_name)
            if stem:
                ten_god = get_ten_god(day_master, stem, self._mappings)
                if ten_god in ["æ­£è´¢", "åè´¢"]:
                    counts["è´¢"] += 1
                elif ten_god in ["æ­£å®˜", "ä¸ƒæ€"]:
                    counts["å®˜æ€"] += 1
                elif ten_god in ["æ­£å°", "åå°"]:
                    counts["å°"] += 1
                elif ten_god in ["é£Ÿç¥", "ä¼¤å®˜"]:
                    counts["é£Ÿä¼¤"] += 1
                elif ten_god in ["æ¯”è‚©", "åŠ«è´¢"]:
                    counts["æ¯”åŠ«"] += 1

        return counts

    def _get_stem(self, four_pillars: Dict[str, Any], pillar_name: str) -> Optional[str]:
        """è·å–æŒ‡å®šæŸ±çš„å¤©å¹²"""
        pillar = four_pillars.get(pillar_name, {})
        if isinstance(pillar, dict):
            return pillar.get("stem")
        return None

    def _get_branch(self, four_pillars: Dict[str, Any], pillar_name: str) -> Optional[str]:
        """è·å–æŒ‡å®šæŸ±çš„åœ°æ”¯"""
        pillar = four_pillars.get(pillar_name, {})
        if isinstance(pillar, dict):
            return pillar.get("branch")
        return None

"""
äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜åˆ†æå™¨ - VibeID v5.0 (é…ç½®é©±åŠ¨ç‰ˆ)

å®ç°äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆå¤ªé˜³/æœˆäº®/ä¸Šå‡/é‡‘æ˜Ÿ/ç«æ˜Ÿï¼‰çš„åŸå‹æ˜ å°„ã€‚

æƒé‡åˆ†é… (ä»é…ç½®åŠ è½½):
- å¤ªé˜³æ˜Ÿåº§: 35% (æ ¸å¿ƒè‡ªæˆ‘)
- æœˆäº®æ˜Ÿåº§: 25% (æƒ…æ„Ÿéœ€æ±‚)
- ä¸Šå‡æ˜Ÿåº§: 20% (ç¤¾ä¼šé¢å…·)
- é‡‘æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§: 10% (çˆ±æƒ…é£æ ¼)
- ç«æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§: 10% (è¡ŒåŠ¨é£æ ¼)
"""

import logging
from typing import Dict, Any, Optional, List

from ...models import ZodiacAnalysis, Archetype
from ..config_loader import (
    get_config,
    get_zodiac_mappings,
    ZodiacMappings,
)

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜åˆ†æå™¨
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

class ZodiacAnalyzer:
    """
    äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜åˆ†æå™¨ï¼ˆé…ç½®é©±åŠ¨ï¼‰

    å®ç°:
    1. äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜æ•°æ®æå–
    2. å„æ˜Ÿåº§â†’åŸå‹æ˜ å°„
    3. Inner/Outer åŸå‹è®¡ç®—
    4. 12åŸå‹å¾—åˆ†è®¡ç®—
    """

    def __init__(self):
        self._config = get_config()
        self._mappings = get_zodiac_mappings()

    @property
    def zodiac_config(self):
        """è·å–æ˜Ÿåº§é…ç½®"""
        return self._config.zodiac

    @property
    def weights(self):
        """è·å–äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜æƒé‡"""
        return self.zodiac_config.weights

    def analyze(
        self,
        natal_chart: Dict[str, Any],
        birth_info: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    ) -> ZodiacAnalysis:
        """
        åˆ†ææ˜Ÿç›˜

        Args:
            natal_chart: æ˜Ÿç›˜æ•°æ®ï¼ŒåŒ…å«å„è¡Œæ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§
            birth_info: å‡ºç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆç”¨äºè®¡ç®—ç¼ºå¤±çš„æ˜Ÿåº§ï¼‰

        Returns:
            ZodiacAnalysis åˆ†æç»“æœ
        """
        # æå–äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿåº§
        sun_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "sun", birth_info)
        moon_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "moon", birth_info)
        rising_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "rising", birth_info)
        venus_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "venus", birth_info)
        mars_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "mars", birth_info)

        # è®¡ç®—ä¸»åŸå‹ï¼ˆåŸºäºå¤ªé˜³æ˜Ÿåº§ï¼‰
        primary_archetype = self._get_primary_archetype(sun_sign)

        # è®¡ç®— Inner åŸå‹ï¼ˆæœˆäº® + é‡‘æ˜Ÿï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®æƒé‡ï¼‰
        inner_archetype = self._calculate_inner_archetype(moon_sign, venus_sign)

        # è®¡ç®— Outer åŸå‹ï¼ˆä¸Šå‡ + ç«æ˜Ÿï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®æƒé‡ï¼‰
        outer_archetype = self._calculate_outer_archetype(rising_sign, mars_sign)

        return ZodiacAnalysis(
            sun_sign=self._mappings.to_cn_name(sun_sign),
            moon_sign=self._mappings.to_cn_name(moon_sign),
            rising_sign=self._mappings.to_cn_name(rising_sign),
            venus_sign=self._mappings.to_cn_name(venus_sign),
            mars_sign=self._mappings.to_cn_name(mars_sign),
            primary_archetype=primary_archetype,
            inner_archetype=inner_archetype,
            outer_archetype=outer_archetype,
        )

    def calculate_archetype_scores(
        self,
        natal_chart: Dict[str, Any],
        birth_info: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    ) -> Dict[str, float]:
        """
        è®¡ç®—12åŸå‹å¾—åˆ†ï¼ˆåŸºäºäº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿç›˜ï¼‰

        Returns:
            å„åŸå‹å¾—åˆ† (0-1 èŒƒå›´ï¼Œéœ€è¦åç»­å½’ä¸€åŒ–åˆ° 0-100)
        """
        scores = {arch.value: 0.0 for arch in Archetype}
        weights = self.weights

        # æå–äº”ç‚¹æ˜Ÿåº§
        sun_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "sun", birth_info)
        moon_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "moon", birth_info)
        rising_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "rising", birth_info)
        venus_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "venus", birth_info)
        mars_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "mars", birth_info)

        # å¤ªé˜³æ˜Ÿåº§è´¡çŒ®
        if sun_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_sun_mapping(sun_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += weights.sun * 1.0
            if mapping.secondary:
                scores[mapping.secondary] += weights.sun * 0.5

        # æœˆäº®æ˜Ÿåº§è´¡çŒ®
        if moon_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_moon_mapping(moon_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += weights.moon * 1.0

        # ä¸Šå‡æ˜Ÿåº§è´¡çŒ®
        if rising_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_ascendant_mapping(rising_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += weights.rising * 1.0

        # é‡‘æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§è´¡çŒ®
        if venus_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_venus_mapping(venus_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += weights.venus * 1.0

        # ç«æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§è´¡çŒ®
        if mars_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_mars_mapping(mars_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += weights.mars * 1.0

        return scores

    def generate_explanations(
        self,
        natal_chart: Dict[str, Any],
        birth_info: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    ) -> List[str]:
        """
        ç”Ÿæˆæ˜Ÿåº§æ´å¯Ÿè§£é‡Š

        Returns:
            è§£é‡Šæ–‡æœ¬åˆ—è¡¨
        """
        explanations = []

        sun_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "sun", birth_info)
        moon_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "moon", birth_info)
        rising_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "rising", birth_info)
        venus_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "venus", birth_info)
        mars_sign = self._get_sign(natal_chart, "mars", birth_info)

        # å¤ªé˜³æ˜Ÿåº§è§£é‡Š
        if sun_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_sun_mapping(sun_sign)
            cn_name = self._mappings.to_cn_name(sun_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                trait = mapping.trait or ""
                explanations.append(
                    f"å¤ªé˜³{cn_name}èµ‹äºˆä½ {mapping.primary}çš„æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹è´¨ï¼Œ{trait}"
                )

        # æœˆäº®æ˜Ÿåº§è§£é‡Š
        if moon_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_moon_mapping(moon_sign)
            cn_name = self._mappings.to_cn_name(moon_sign)
            if mapping.style:
                explanations.append(
                    f"æœˆäº®{cn_name}è®©ä½ çš„æƒ…æ„Ÿè¡¨è¾¾å‘ˆç°{mapping.style}"
                )

        # ä¸Šå‡æ˜Ÿåº§è§£é‡Š
        if rising_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_ascendant_mapping(rising_sign)
            cn_name = self._mappings.to_cn_name(rising_sign)
            if mapping.impression:
                explanations.append(
                    f"ä¸Šå‡{cn_name}è®©ä½ ç»™äºº{mapping.impression}çš„å°è±¡"
                )

        # é‡‘æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§è§£é‡Š
        if venus_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_venus_mapping(venus_sign)
            cn_name = self._mappings.to_cn_name(venus_sign)
            if mapping.love_style:
                explanations.append(
                    f"é‡‘æ˜Ÿ{cn_name}è®©ä½ çš„çˆ±æƒ…é£æ ¼æ˜¯{mapping.love_style}"
                )

        # ç«æ˜Ÿæ˜Ÿåº§è§£é‡Š
        if mars_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_mars_mapping(mars_sign)
            cn_name = self._mappings.to_cn_name(mars_sign)
            if mapping.action_style:
                explanations.append(
                    f"ç«æ˜Ÿ{cn_name}è®©ä½ çš„è¡ŒåŠ¨é£æ ¼æ˜¯{mapping.action_style}"
                )

        return explanations

    def _get_sign(
        self,
        natal_chart: Dict[str, Any],
        planet: str,
        birth_info: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    ) -> Optional[str]:
        """è·å–æŒ‡å®šè¡Œæ˜Ÿçš„æ˜Ÿåº§"""
        # å°è¯•å¤šç§æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼

        # æ ¼å¼1: natal_chart.sun_sign
        sign_key = f"{planet}_sign"
        if sign_key in natal_chart:
            return self._normalize_sign(natal_chart[sign_key])

        # æ ¼å¼2: natal_chart.planets.sun.sign
        planets = natal_chart.get("planets", {})
        if planet in planets:
            planet_data = planets[planet]
            if isinstance(planet_data, dict):
                return self._normalize_sign(planet_data.get("sign"))
            return self._normalize_sign(planet_data)

        # æ ¼å¼3: ç›´æ¥å­—æ®µ (rising -> ascendant)
        if planet == "rising":
            if "ascendant" in natal_chart:
                return self._normalize_sign(natal_chart["ascendant"])
            if "rising_sign" in natal_chart:
                return self._normalize_sign(natal_chart["rising_sign"])

        # æ ¼å¼4: ä» chart å­å¯¹è±¡è·å–
        chart = natal_chart.get("chart", {})
        if sign_key in chart:
            return self._normalize_sign(chart[sign_key])

        return None

    def _normalize_sign(self, sign: Optional[str]) -> Optional[str]:
        """æ ‡å‡†åŒ–æ˜Ÿåº§åç§°ä¸ºè‹±æ–‡å°å†™"""
        if not sign:
            return None

        sign = sign.lower().strip()

        # ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„ä¸­æ–‡è½¬è‹±æ–‡æ˜ å°„
        cn_to_en = self._mappings.zodiac_cn_to_en
        if sign in cn_to_en:
            return cn_to_en[sign]

        # å·²ç»æ˜¯è‹±æ–‡
        if sign in self._mappings.sun_sign_mapping:
            return sign

        return None

    def _get_primary_archetype(self, sun_sign: Optional[str]) -> str:
        """è·å–ä¸»åŸå‹ï¼ˆåŸºäºå¤ªé˜³æ˜Ÿåº§ï¼‰"""
        defaults = self.zodiac_config.defaults

        if not sun_sign:
            return defaults.primary_archetype

        mapping = self._mappings.get_sun_mapping(sun_sign)
        return mapping.primary or defaults.primary_archetype

    def _calculate_inner_archetype(
        self,
        moon_sign: Optional[str],
        venus_sign: Optional[str]
    ) -> str:
        """
        è®¡ç®— Inner åŸå‹

        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„æƒé‡: æœˆäº® + é‡‘æ˜Ÿ
        """
        scores = {arch.value: 0.0 for arch in Archetype}
        inner_weights = self.zodiac_config.inner_weights
        defaults = self.zodiac_config.defaults

        # æœˆäº®è´¡çŒ®
        if moon_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_moon_mapping(moon_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += inner_weights.moon

        # é‡‘æ˜Ÿè´¡çŒ®
        if venus_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_venus_mapping(venus_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += inner_weights.venus

        # è¿”å›æœ€é«˜åˆ†åŸå‹
        if scores:
            max_archetype = max(scores, key=scores.get)
            if scores[max_archetype] > 0:
                return max_archetype

        return defaults.inner_archetype

    def _calculate_outer_archetype(
        self,
        rising_sign: Optional[str],
        mars_sign: Optional[str]
    ) -> str:
        """
        è®¡ç®— Outer åŸå‹

        ä½¿ç”¨é…ç½®çš„æƒé‡: ä¸Šå‡ + ç«æ˜Ÿ
        """
        scores = {arch.value: 0.0 for arch in Archetype}
        outer_weights = self.zodiac_config.outer_weights
        defaults = self.zodiac_config.defaults

        # ä¸Šå‡è´¡çŒ®
        if rising_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_ascendant_mapping(rising_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += outer_weights.rising

        # ç«æ˜Ÿè´¡çŒ®
        if mars_sign:
            mapping = self._mappings.get_mars_mapping(mars_sign)
            if mapping.primary:
                scores[mapping.primary] += outer_weights.mars

        # è¿”å›æœ€é«˜åˆ†åŸå‹
        if scores:
            max_archetype = max(scores, key=scores.get)
            if scores[max_archetype] > 0:
                return max_archetype

        return defaults.outer_archetype

# ä¾¿æ·å‡½æ•°

def analyze_zodiac(
    natal_chart: Dict[str, Any],

) -> ZodiacAnalysis:
    """
    åˆ†ææ˜Ÿç›˜ï¼ˆä¾¿æ·å‡½æ•°ï¼‰

    Args:
        natal_chart: æ˜Ÿç›˜æ•°æ®
        birth_info: å‡ºç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯

    Returns:
        ZodiacAnalysis åˆ†æç»“æœ
    """
    analyzer = ZodiacAnalyzer()
    return analyzer.analyze(natal_chart, birth_info)


def calculate_zodiac_archetype_scores(
    natal_chart: Dict[str, Any],

) -> Dict[str, float]:
    """
    è®¡ç®—æ˜Ÿç›˜åŸå‹å¾—åˆ†ï¼ˆä¾¿æ·å‡½æ•°ï¼‰

"""
VibeID v6.0 æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹ (V7 æ¶æ„ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆ)

å˜æ›´:
- ä¿ç•™ Archetype æšä¸¾ (ç”¨äºéªŒè¯)
- ä¿ç•™ BaziAnalysis, ZodiacAnalysis (analyzer ä½¿ç”¨)
- åˆ é™¤ VibeIDProfile, VibeIDResponse (service è¿”å› Dict)
- ç®€åŒ–åŸå‹ä¿¡æ¯è®¿é—®å‡½æ•°
"""

from dataclasses import dataclass, asdict
from typing import Dict, Any, Optional, List
from enum import Enum


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# 12 åŸå‹æšä¸¾
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

class Archetype(str, Enum):
    """12 åŸå‹æšä¸¾"""
    INNOCENT = "Innocent"
    EXPLORER = "Explorer"
    SAGE = "Sage"
    HERO = "Hero"
    OUTLAW = "Outlaw"
    MAGICIAN = "Magician"
    REGULAR = "Regular"
    LOVER = "Lover"
    JESTER = "Jester"
    CAREGIVER = "Caregiver"
    CREATOR = "Creator"
    RULER = "Ruler"


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# åˆ†æç»“æœæ•°æ®ç±» (analyzer ä½¿ç”¨)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@dataclass
class BaziAnalysis:
    """å…«å­—åˆ†æç»“æœ (BaziAnalyzer è¾“å‡º)"""
    day_master: str                              # æ—¥ä¸»å¤©å¹²
    day_master_element: str                      # æ—¥ä¸»äº”è¡Œ
    day_master_strength: str                     # ææ—º/åæ—º/ä¸­å’Œ/åå¼±/æå¼±
    day_master_strength_score: float             # -1.0 ~ 1.0
    pattern: str                                 # æ ¼å±€åç§°
    useful_god: str                              # ç”¨ç¥ç±»å‹
    archetype_driver: str                        # åŸå‹é©±åŠ¨æè¿°
    primary_archetype: str                       # ä¸»åŸå‹
    secondary_archetype: Optional[str] = None    # å‰¯åŸå‹

    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        return asdict(self)

    @property
    def brief(self) -> str:
        """ç®€è¿°"""
        return f"{self.pattern} Â· ç”¨ç¥ä¸º{self.useful_god} Â· èº«{self.day_master_strength}"


@dataclass
class ZodiacAnalysis:
    """æ˜Ÿç›˜åˆ†æç»“æœ (ZodiacAnalyzer è¾“å‡º)"""
    sun_sign: str
    moon_sign: str
    rising_sign: str
    venus_sign: Optional[str] = None
    mars_sign: Optional[str] = None
    primary_archetype: str = ""
    inner_archetype: str = ""                    # æœˆäº®+é‡‘æ˜Ÿ
    outer_archetype: str = ""                    # ä¸Šå‡+ç«æ˜Ÿ

    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        return asdict(self)

    @property
    def brief(self) -> str:
        """ç®€è¿°"""
        parts = [f"å¤ªé˜³{self.sun_sign}"]
        if self.moon_sign:
            parts.append(f"æœˆäº®{self.moon_sign}")
        if self.rising_sign:
            parts.append(f"ä¸Šå‡{self.rising_sign}")
        return " Â· ".join(parts)


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# åŸå‹ä¿¡æ¯è®¿é—®å‡½æ•° (å§”æ‰˜ç»™ config_loader)
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

def get_archetype_info(archetype_id: str) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
    """è·å–åŸå‹å®Œæ•´ä¿¡æ¯"""
    from .services.config_loader import get_archetype_metadata
    metadata = get_archetype_metadata()
    return metadata.get_archetype(archetype_id) or None


def get_archetype_cn_name(archetype_id: str) -> str:
    """è·å–åŸå‹ä¸­æ–‡å"""
    from .services.config_loader import get_archetype_metadata
    metadata = get_archetype_metadata()
    return metadata.get_cn_name(archetype_id)


def get_archetype_emoji(archetype_id: str) -> str:
    """è·å–åŸå‹ Emoji"""
    from .services.config_loader import get_archetype_metadata
    metadata = get_archetype_metadata()
    return metadata.get_emoji(archetype_id)


def get_archetype_nickname(archetype_id: str) -> str:
    """è·å–åŸå‹æ˜µç§°"""
    from .services.config_loader import get_archetype_metadata

   464â†’        """
   465â†’        æ›´æ–°è´¦æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ (Migration 022 compatible)
   466â†’
   467â†’        Post-Migration 022: display_name å’Œ avatar_url åªå­˜åœ¨äº unified_profiles.profile.account

   475â†’        update_fields = {}

   478â†’        if avatar_url is not None:

   483â†’            async with get_connection() as conn:
   484â†’                # Build JSONB update path

   499â†’                        ['account', key],

   501â†’                    )
   502â†’
   503â†’            # å¤±æ•ˆç¼“å­˜
   504â†’            await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)

  1283â†’        Args:

  1308â†’    @staticmethod

  1312â†’        content: Dict[str, Any],
  1313â†’        expected_version: Optional[int] = None,
  1314â†’    ) -> LifeContextData:
  1315â†’        """
  1316â†’        å†™å…¥ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡çš„æŒ‡å®šè·¯å¾„
  1317â†’
  1318â†’        Args:
  1319â†’            user_id: ç”¨æˆ· ID
  1320â†’            path: è™šæ‹Ÿè·¯å¾„
  1321â†’            content: JSON å†…å®¹
  1322â†’            expected_version: æœŸæœ›ç‰ˆæœ¬å·ï¼ˆä¹è§‚é”ï¼‰
  1323â†’
  1324â†’        Returns:
  1325â†’            æ›´æ–°åçš„ LifeContextData å¯¹è±¡
  1326â†’        """
  1327â†’        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1328â†’        if not profile:

  1330â†’
  1331â†’        life_context = profile.get("life_context", {})
  1332â†’        paths = life_context.get("_paths", {})
  1333â†’        existing = paths.get(path, {})
  1334â†’
  1335â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥ç‰ˆæœ¬å†²çª
  1336â†’        if expected_version is not None:
  1337â†’            current_version = existing.get("version", 0)
  1338â†’            if current_version != expected_version:

  1340â†’
  1341â†’        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
  1342â†’        new_version = existing.get("version", 0) + 1
  1343â†’
  1344â†’        paths[path] = {
  1345â†’            "content": content,

  1532â†’    @staticmethod
  1533â†’    async def append_to_skill_list(

  1535â†’        skill_id: str,
  1536â†’        path: str,
  1537â†’        entry: Dict[str, Any],
  1538â†’        max_items: int = 100
  1539â†’    ) -> None:
  1540â†’        """
  1541â†’        å‘ Skill æ•°æ®ä¸­çš„åˆ—è¡¨è¿½åŠ æ¡ç›®
  1542â†’
  1543â†’        Args:
  1544â†’            user_id: ç”¨æˆ· ID
  1545â†’            skill_id: Skill ID
  1546â†’            path: åˆ—è¡¨è·¯å¾„ï¼Œå¦‚ "journal" æˆ– "progress.milestones"
  1547â†’            entry: è¦è¿½åŠ çš„æ¡ç›®
  1548â†’            max_items: åˆ—è¡¨æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ï¼ˆè¶…å‡ºåˆ™åˆ é™¤æœ€æ—§çš„ï¼‰
  1549â†’        """
  1550â†’        # è·å–å½“å‰æ•°æ®
  1551â†’        skill_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_state(user_id, skill_id)
  1552â†’
  1553â†’        # è§£æè·¯å¾„
  1554â†’        parts = path.split(".")
  1555â†’        current = skill_data
  1556â†’        for part in parts[:-1]:
  1557â†’            current = current.setdefault(part, {})
  1558â†’
  1559â†’        # è·å–æˆ–åˆ›å»ºåˆ—è¡¨
  1560â†’        list_key = parts[-1]
  1561â†’        current_list = current.get(list_key, [])
  1562â†’        if not isinstance(current_list, list):

  1564â†’
  1565â†’        # è¿½åŠ å¹¶é™åˆ¶é•¿åº¦ï¼ˆæ–°æ¡ç›®åœ¨å‰ï¼‰
  1566â†’        current_list = [entry] + current_list[:max_items - 1]
  1567â†’        current[list_key] = current_list
  1568â†’
  1569â†’        # å†™å›
  1570â†’        if len(parts) > 1:
  1571â†’            # å¤šçº§è·¯å¾„ï¼šæ›´æ–°çˆ¶çº§å¯¹è±¡
  1572â†’            await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_state(
  1573â†’                user_id, skill_id, parts[0], skill_data.get(parts[0], {})

  1575â†’        else:
  1576â†’            # å•çº§è·¯å¾„ï¼šç›´æ¥æ›´æ–°
  1577â†’            await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_state(
  1578â†’                user_id, skill_id, list_key, current_list
  1579â†’            )
  1580â†’

  1583â†’    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

  1641â†’class ColdLayerRepository:
  1642â†’    """Cold Layer æ•°æ®ä»“åº“ - å­˜å‚¨é•¿æœŸæ´å¯Ÿå’Œæ—¶é—´çº¿äº‹ä»¶"""

  1644â†’    @staticmethod
  1645â†’    async def add_insight(
  1646â†’        user_id: UUID,
  1647â†’        insight_type: str,
  1648â†’        content: str,
  1649â†’        skill_id: Optional[str] = None,
  1650â†’        metadata: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
  1651â†’    ) -> ProfileInsight:
  1652â†’        """æ·»åŠ  AI æ´å¯Ÿ"""
  1653â†’        from uuid import uuid4
  1654â†’        insight_id = uuid4()
  1655â†’
  1656â†’        await execute(
  1657â†’            """INSERT INTO vibe_profile_insights (id, user_id, insight_type, skill_id, content, metadata)
  1658â†’               VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6::jsonb)""",
  1659â†’            insight_id, user_id, insight_type, skill_id, content,
  1660â†’            json.dumps(metadata or {}, ensure_ascii=False)
  1661â†’        )
  1662â†’
  1663â†’        return ProfileInsight(
  1664â†’            id=insight_id,
  1665â†’            user_id=user_id,
  1666â†’            insight_type=insight_type,
  1667â†’            skill_id=skill_id,
  1668â†’            content=content,
  1669â†’            metadata=metadata or {},
  1670â†’            created_at=datetime.now(timezone.utc)
  1671â†’        )

  1673â†’    @staticmethod
  1674â†’    async def get_insights(
  1675â†’        user_id: UUID,
  1676â†’        insight_type: Optional[str] = None,
  1677â†’        skill_id: Optional[str] = None,
  1678â†’        limit: int = 20
  1679â†’    ) -> List[ProfileInsight]:
  1680â†’        """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·æ´å¯Ÿ"""
  1681â†’        conditions = ["user_id = $1"]
  1682â†’        params = [user_id]
  1683â†’        param_idx = 2
  1684â†’
  1685â†’        if insight_type:
  1686â†’            conditions.append(f"insight_type = ${param_idx}")
  1687â†’            params.append(insight_type)
  1688â†’            param_idx += 1
  1689â†’
  1690â†’        if skill_id:
  1691â†’            conditions.append(f"skill_id = ${param_idx}")
  1692â†’            params.append(skill_id)
  1693â†’            param_idx += 1
  1694â†’
  1695â†’        params.append(limit)
  1696â†’
  1697â†’        rows = await fetch(
  1698â†’            f"""SELECT id, user_id, insight_type, skill_id, content, metadata, created_at
  1699â†’               FROM vibe_profile_insights
  1700â†’               WHERE {' AND '.join(conditions)}
  1701â†’               ORDER BY created_at DESC
  1702â†’               LIMIT ${param_idx}""",
  1703â†’            *params
  1704â†’        )
  1705â†’
  1706â†’        return [
  1707â†’            ProfileInsight(
  1708â†’                id=row["id"],
  1709â†’                user_id=row["user_id"],
  1710â†’                insight_type=row["insight_type"],
  1711â†’                skill_id=row["skill_id"],
  1712â†’                content=row["content"],
  1713â†’                metadata=row["metadata"] if isinstance(row["metadata"], dict) else json.loads(row["metadata"] or "{}"),
  1714â†’                created_at=row["created_at"]
  1715â†’            )
  1716â†’            for row in rows
  1717â†’        ]
  1718â†’

"""
Unified Profile Repository - ç»Ÿä¸€ Profile æ•°æ®è®¿é—®å±‚

åŸºäº unified_profiles è¡¨ï¼Œæä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€çš„ Profile è®¿é—®æ¥å£ã€‚
ä½¿ç”¨ jsonb_set() è¿›è¡Œå±€éƒ¨æ›´æ–°ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å†™æ•´ä¸ª profileã€‚

v7.7 é‡æ„ï¼šæ·»åŠ  account å’Œ state å­—æ®µ
- account: ä» vibe_users åŒæ­¥ (vibe_id, display_name, tier, status)
- state: ç”¨æˆ·å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€ (focus)

v7.6 é‡æ„ï¼šæ•´åˆä»¥ä¸‹åŠŸèƒ½åˆ°ç»Ÿä¸€ Profile:
- Skill è®¢é˜…ç®¡ç† (åŸ user_skill_subscriptions)
- æ¨é€åå¥½ (åŸ user_push_preferences)
- ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ (åŸ user_data_store)
- Skill æ¨èå±è”½ (åŸ skill_recommendation_blocks)

Profile ç»“æ„:
{
    "account": {
        "vibe_id": "VB-A1B2C3D4",
        "display_name": "ç”¨æˆ·æ˜µç§°",
        "tier": "free",
        "status": "active"
    },
    "birth_info": {...},
    "state": {
        "focus": ["career", "health"],
        "updated_at": "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z"
    },
    "life_context": {...},
    "preferences": {
        "voice_mode": "warm",
        "language": "zh-CN",
        "timezone": "Asia/Shanghai",
        "subscribed_skills": {
            "bazi": {"status": "subscribed", "push_enabled": true, ...},
            ...
        },
        "push_settings": {
            "default_push_hour": 8,
            "max_daily_pushes": 5,
            "quiet_start_hour": 22,
            "quiet_end_hour": 7
        },
        "blocked_skills": ["skill_id_1", ...]
    },
    "skill_data": {...},
    "extracted": {...}
}
"""
import json
import logging
from dataclasses import dataclass
from datetime import datetime, date, timezone
from typing import Optional, Dict, Any, List
from uuid import UUID

from .db import get_connection, fetch, fetchrow, fetchval, execute

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Data Classes
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@dataclass
class SkillSubscription:
    """Skill è®¢é˜…æ•°æ®ç±» (å…¼å®¹æ—§æ¥å£)"""
    skill_id: str
    status: str  # subscribed | unsubscribed | not_subscribed
    push_enabled: bool
    subscribed_at: Optional[datetime]
    unsubscribed_at: Optional[datetime]
    trial_messages_used: int

    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        return {
            "skill_id": self.skill_id,
            "status": self.status,
            "push_enabled": self.push_enabled,
            "subscribed_at": self.subscribed_at.isoformat() if self.subscribed_at else None,
            "unsubscribed_at": self.unsubscribed_at.isoformat() if self.unsubscribed_at else None,
            "trial_messages_used": self.trial_messages_used,
        }


@dataclass
class UserPushPreferences:
    """ç”¨æˆ·æ¨é€åå¥½ (å…¼å®¹æ—§æ¥å£)"""
    user_id: UUID
    default_push_hour: int = 8
    max_daily_pushes: int = 5
    quiet_start_hour: int = 22
    quiet_end_hour: int = 7

    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        return {
            "user_id": str(self.user_id),
            "default_push_hour": self.default_push_hour,
            "max_daily_pushes": self.max_daily_pushes,
            "quiet_start_hour": self.quiet_start_hour,
            "quiet_end_hour": self.quiet_end_hour,
        }


@dataclass
class LifeContextData:
    """ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ•°æ® (æ›¿ä»£ UserData)"""
    path: str
    content: Dict[str, Any]
    version: int = 1
    updated_at: Optional[datetime] = None

    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        return {
            "path": self.path,
            "content": self.content,
            "version": self.version,
            "updated_at": self.updated_at.isoformat() if self.updated_at else None,
        }


def deep_merge(base: Dict, update: Dict) -> Dict:
    """
    æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—å…¸

    è§„åˆ™ï¼š
    - å¦‚æœ update ä¸­çš„å€¼æ˜¯ dictï¼Œé€’å½’åˆå¹¶
    - å¦‚æœ update ä¸­çš„å€¼æ˜¯ Noneï¼Œåˆ é™¤è¯¥é”®
    - å¦åˆ™ï¼Œupdate çš„å€¼è¦†ç›– base
    """
    result = base.copy()
    for key, value in update.items():
        if value is None:
            # None è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ é™¤è¯¥é”®
            result.pop(key, None)
        elif key in result and isinstance(result[key], dict) and isinstance(value, dict):
            # é€’å½’åˆå¹¶åµŒå¥—å­—å…¸
            result[key] = deep_merge(result[key], value)
        else:
            # è¦†ç›–å€¼
            result[key] = value
    return result


class UnifiedProfileRepository:
    """ç»Ÿä¸€ Profile æ•°æ®è®¿é—®å±‚"""

    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    # è¯»å–æ“ä½œ
    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    @staticmethod
    async def get_profile(user_id: UUID) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """è·å–å®Œæ•´ Profile"""
        row = await fetchrow(
            "SELECT profile FROM unified_profiles WHERE user_id = $1",
            user_id
        )
        if not row:
            return None

        profile = row["profile"]
        if isinstance(profile, str):
            profile = json.loads(profile)
        return profile

    @staticmethod
    async def get_birth_info(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """è·å–å‡ºç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯"""
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            identity = profile.get("identity", {})
            return identity.get("birth_info", {})
        return {}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_skill_data(user_id: UUID, skill: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """è·å– Skill æ•°æ®"""
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            return profile.get("skill_data", {}).get(skill, {})
        return {}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_all_skill_data(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """è·å–æ‰€æœ‰ Skill æ•°æ®"""
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            return profile.get("skill_data", {})
        return {}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_preferences(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·åå¥½"""
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            return profile.get("preferences", {"voice_mode": "warm", "language": "zh-CN"})
        return {"voice_mode": "warm", "language": "zh-CN"}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_life_context(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """è·å–ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡"""
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            return profile.get("life_context", {})
        return {}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_account(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        è·å–è´¦æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ (ä» vibe_users åŒæ­¥)

        Returns:
            {
                "vibe_id": "VB-A1B2C3D4",
                "display_name": "ç”¨æˆ·æ˜µç§°",
                "tier": "free",
                "status": "active"
            }
        """
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            return profile.get("account", {})
        return {}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_state(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        è·å–ç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€

        Returns:
            {
                "focus": ["career", "health"],
                "updated_at": "2026-01-19T10:00:00Z"
            }
        """
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if profile:
            return profile.get("state", {"focus": [], "updated_at": None})
        return {"focus": [], "updated_at": None}

    @staticmethod
    async def get_focus(user_id: UUID) -> List[str]:
        """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·å½“å‰å…³æ³¨çš„è¯é¢˜"""
        state = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_state(user_id)
        return state.get("focus", [])

    @staticmethod
    async def get_tier(user_id: UUID) -> str:
        """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ç­‰çº§ (free, basic, pro, enterprise)"""
        account = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_account(user_id)
        return account.get("tier", "free")

    @staticmethod
    async def get_account_full(user_id: UUID) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        è·å–å®Œæ•´è´¦æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆæ›¿ä»£ UserRepository.get_by_idï¼‰

        Returns:
            å®Œæ•´çš„è´¦æˆ·+åå¥½ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š
            {
                "vibe_id": "VB-xxx",
                "display_name": "ç”¨æˆ·æ˜µç§°",
                "avatar_url": "https://...",
                "tier": "free",
                "status": "active",
                "timezone": "Asia/Shanghai",
                "language": "zh-CN",
                "deletion_requested_at": null,
                "deletion_scheduled_at": null
            }
        """
        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
        if not profile:
            return {}

        account = profile.get("account", {})
        prefs = profile.get("preferences", {})

        return {
            "vibe_id": account.get("vibe_id"),
            "display_name": account.get("display_name"),
            "avatar_url": account.get("avatar_url"),
            "tier": account.get("tier", "free"),
            "status": account.get("status", "active"),
            "timezone": prefs.get("timezone", "Asia/Shanghai"),
            "language": prefs.get("language", "zh-CN"),
            "deletion_requested_at": account.get("deletion_requested_at"),
            "deletion_scheduled_at": account.get("deletion_scheduled_at"),
        }

    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    # å†™å…¥æ“ä½œ
    # â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

    @staticmethod
    async def create_profile(user_id: UUID, initial_profile: Dict[str, Any] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„ Profile"""
        profile = initial_profile or {
            "account": {},  # Will be synced from vibe_users via trigger
            "birth_info": {},
            "state": {"focus": [], "updated_at": None},
            "life_context": {},
            "preferences": {"voice_mode": "warm", "language": "zh-CN"},
            "skill_data": {}
        }

        await execute(
            """INSERT INTO unified_profiles (user_id, profile)
               VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb)
               ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO NOTHING""",
            user_id, json.dumps(profile, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
        )

        return profile

    @staticmethod
    async def update_profile(user_id: UUID, updates: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
        """
        æ›´æ–° Profile (å…¨é‡åˆå¹¶æ›´æ–°)

        Args:
            user_id: ç”¨æˆ· ID
            updates: è¦æ›´æ–°çš„å­—æ®µï¼Œä¼šä¸ç°æœ‰æ•°æ®æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶
        """
        current = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)

        if current:
            merged = deep_merge(current, updates)
            await execute(
                """UPDATE unified_profiles
                   SET profile = $2::jsonb, updated_at = NOW()
                   WHERE user_id = $1""",
                user_id, json.dumps(merged, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
            )
        else:
            # ä¸å­˜åœ¨åˆ™åˆ›å»º
            default_profile = {
                "birth_info": {},
                "life_context": {},
                "preferences": {"voice_mode": "warm", "language": "zh-CN"},
                "skill_data": {}
            }
            merged = deep_merge(default_profile, updates)
            await execute(
                """INSERT INTO unified_profiles (user_id, profile)
                   VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb)""",
                user_id, json.dumps(merged, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
            )

        # å¤±æ•ˆç¼“å­˜
        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)

    @staticmethod
    async def update_birth_info(user_id: UUID, birth_info: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
        """
        æ›´æ–°å‡ºç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ (ä½¿ç”¨ jsonb_set å±€éƒ¨æ›´æ–°)

        Args:
            user_id: ç”¨æˆ· ID
            birth_info: å‡ºç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ {date, time, place, gender, timezone}
        """
        # ç¡®ä¿è®°å½•å­˜åœ¨
        exists = await fetchval(
            "SELECT 1 FROM unified_profiles WHERE user_id = $1",
            user_id
        )

        if exists:
            await execute(
                """UPDATE unified_profiles
                   SET profile = jsonb_set(
                       COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
                       '{birth_info}',
                       $2::jsonb
                   ),
                   updated_at = NOW()
                   WHERE user_id = $1""",
                user_id, json.dumps(birth_info, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
            )
        else:
            await UnifiedProfileRepository.create_profile(user_id, {"birth_info": birth_info})

        # å¤±æ•ˆæ‰€æœ‰ç¼“å­˜ (birth_info å½±å“æ‰€æœ‰ skill)
        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)

    @staticmethod
    async def update_skill_data(user_id: UUID, skill: str, data: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
        """
        æ›´æ–° Skill æ•°æ® (ä½¿ç”¨ jsonb_set å±€éƒ¨æ›´æ–°ï¼Œé¿å…é‡å†™æ•´ä¸ª profile)

        Args:
            user_id: ç”¨æˆ· ID
            skill: Skill æ ‡è¯† (bazi, zodiac, tarot, career)
            data: Skill æ•°æ® (å¦‚å‘½ç›˜æ•°æ®)
        """
        # ç¡®ä¿è®°å½•å­˜åœ¨
        exists = await fetchval(
            "SELECT 1 FROM unified_profiles WHERE user_id = $1",
            user_id
        )

        if exists:
            # ä½¿ç”¨ jsonb_set è¿›è¡ŒåµŒå¥—è·¯å¾„æ›´æ–°
            # å…ˆç¡®ä¿ skill_data å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œå†è®¾ç½®å…·ä½“ skill
            await execute(
                """UPDATE unified_profiles
                   SET profile = jsonb_set(
                       jsonb_set(
                           COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
                           '{skill_data}',
                           COALESCE(profile -> 'skill_data', '{}'::jsonb)
                       ),
                       ARRAY['skill_data', $2],
                       $3::jsonb
                   ),
                   updated_at = NOW()
                   WHERE user_id = $1""",
                user_id, skill, json.dumps(data, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
            )
        else:
            await UnifiedProfileRepository.create_profile(user_id, {"skill_data": {skill: data}})

        # åªå¤±æ•ˆè¯¥ skill çš„ç¼“å­˜
        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id, skill)

    @staticmethod
    async def update_preferences(user_id: UUID, preferences: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
        """æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·åå¥½ (ä½¿ç”¨ jsonb_set å±€éƒ¨æ›´æ–°)"""
        exists = await fetchval(

            await execute(

                   ),

                user_id, json.dumps(merged_prefs, ensure_ascii=False)
            )
